title: [WeConnect]泰港台三地聯手潰擊愛國5毛軍 網組「奶茶聯盟」

replies.msg:
歷史應該點稱呼呢場戰役

Insta-star wars: China tensions in Southeast Asia flare online

“This is the first transnational geopolitical Twitter war Thais have engaged in,” said Prajak Kongkirati of Bangkok’s Thammasat University.

“We see people questioning China’s actions and influence ... The celebrity issue is the tip of the iceberg.”

https://www.reuters.com/article/us-thailand-china-internet/insta-star-wars-china-tensions-in-southeast-asia-flare-online-idUSKCN21W11P

How a Photo Sparked a Twitter War Between Chinese Nationalist Trolls and Young Thais

"The pro-democracy youth movements...have now taken a step closer together, bonded in spirit by their alliance in 'the battle of #nnevvy'"

https://www.vice.com/en_asia/article/xgqjkw/twitter-war-thailand-china-nationalism-trolls-memes




Twitter: #MilkTeaAlliance #奶茶聯盟

但小心過程中比中共又玩分化
